===== Transaction Date ===== 
==== Example Usage ====

Date in the lifecycle of the financial transaction.  ISO 8601 date (yyyy-mm-dd):

<code xml>
    <transaction-date iso-date="2010-05-27"/>
</code>

Text describing the date of a financial transaction. For recording less specific dates (month, quarter, year) where full (iso) date is not known:

<code xml>
    <transaction-date>May 2010</transaction-date>
</code>
